meanings.definition: Capable of being presented on a stage.
meanings.sent1: The actors practiced their stageable performance for weeks.
meanings.sent2: The play had many stageable scenes that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat's stageable antics on the stage caused laughter in the theater.
meanings.sent4: Her stageable presence on the stage was like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The magician's stageable tricks amazed everyone in the audience.

meanings.definition: Able to be arranged or prepared for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The stageable props were set up before the show.
meanings.sent2: The room was stageable for the surprise party.
meanings.sent3: The stageable cupcakes were a hit at the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: Her stageable plan for the event impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The stageable tools made the job much easier to complete.
